column1: Figure 6: UK energy price inflation was the highest across major advanced economies in March 2023
12-month rate of energy CPI inflation, G7, January 2018 to March 2023

column2: 1. Since 2019, energy prices are up by a cumulative 69% in the UK, 63% in Italy, 47% in Germany, 37% in France, 30% in the US, 25% in Canada, and 10% in Japan.
